response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. Given its significance to you, I believe it's only fair to share the true worth of this item. However, recognizing the market dynamics and your potential interest, I propose to offer you the chance to purchase this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a premium yet reasonable cost. I trust this offer will be favorable to both parties and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1200000}
